text:
@capt_amarinder Sir,
I'm a student of CGC Landran
Due to COVID-19 all are suffering, families can't afford the college fees but they force us to pay before 26/06/20 instead of adjusting the fees of last sem n also threatened that if it is not paid they'll cancel our admission
Please help us🙏🏻
